paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a TTR variant associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We have studied DNA from a family of Greek descent with FAP.

functional_data.summary: The mutation results in an amino acid change from alanine to proline at position 36.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed by protein sequencing of the proband's plasma TTR.
key_quotes: This substitution removes a recognition site for endonuclease Fnu4HI.
The predicted amino acid change of alanine to proline at position 36 was confirmed by protein sequencing of the proband's plasma TTR.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
